title.rendered: HelloRetail and Sleeknote: How Smart Marketers are Generating Quality Leads and Increasing Sales

content.rendered:
Join HelloRetail and Sleeknote for this training, and get 7 actionable strategies you can use to get more quality leads and increase sales. We’ll give you concrete examples of how you can capture and convert more email addresses for your email marketing. We’ll also share the very best strategies for increasing email engagement and turning subscribers into repeat customers.

In This Webinar You Will Learn

Here’s a little summary of some of the subjects we cover in this webinar

  • How to welcome new site visitors
  • How to segment your visitors and show relevant messages
  • How to turn abandoned carts into profit
  • How to personalize your newsletters to increase click-rates and reduce unsubscribes
  • How to create 1:1 targeted emails on autopilot
